statements: SELECT * FROM QRCodeTransactions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM QRCodeTransactions WHERE amount > 50;
SELECT qrcode_data FROM QRCodeTransactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM QRCodeTransactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as transaction_count FROM QRCodeTransactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM QRCodeTransactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, qrcode_data FROM QRCodeTransactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS total_transactions FROM QRCodeTransactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM QRCodeTransactions WHERE qrcode_data LIKE '%abc%' AND amount < 50 ORDER BY amount ASC, transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM QRCodeTransactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM qr_code_transactions;
SELECT qr_code, amount, transaction_date FROM qr_code_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM qr_code_indexes ORDER BY index_id DESC;
SELECT qr_code, transaction_id FROM qr_code_indexes WHERE qr_code LIKE 'AB%' ORDER BY qr_code ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, qr_code FROM qr_code_indexes INNER JOIN qr_code_transactions ON qr_code_indexes.transaction_id = qr_code_transactions.transaction_id;
SELECT qr_code, amount FROM qr_code_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, qr_code, amount FROM qr_code_transactions WHERE qr_code LIKE '%ABC%' AND amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT qr_code, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM qr_code_transactions GROUP BY qr_code HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 2 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT qr_code, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM qr_code_transactions GROUP BY qr_code;

SELECT qr_code_indexes.qr_code, qr_code_transactions.amount FROM qr_code_indexes JOIN qr_code_transactions ON qr_code_indexes.transaction_id = qr_code_transactions.transaction_id WHERE qr_code_indexes.index_id < 10 ORDER BY qr_code_indexes.index_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM qr_code_transactions;
SELECT qr_code, transaction_amount FROM qr_code_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM qr_code_users WHERE user_name = 'John';
SELECT qr_code, log_message, log_date FROM qr_code_logs WHERE qr_code = 'ABC123' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM qr_code_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM qr_code_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT qr_code, transaction_amount FROM qr_code_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM qr_code_users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT qr_code, log_message, log_date FROM qr_code_logs WHERE qr_code = 'ABC123' AND log_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT qr_code, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM qr_code_transactions GROUP BY qr_code HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM qr_code_transactions;
SELECT qr_code_id, amount, timestamp FROM qr_code_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM qr_code_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%Store%';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM qr_code_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM qr_code_products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM qr_code_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT qr_code_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM qr_code_transactions GROUP BY qr_code_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;

SELECT qr_code_id, user_name, user_email FROM qr_code_users JOIN qr_code_transactions ON qr_code_users.qr_code_id = qr_code_transactions.qr_code_id WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, price FROM qr_code_products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, COUNT(qr_code_id) AS total_qr_codes FROM qr_code_locations GROUP BY location_name HAVING total_qr_codes >= 3;
SELECT * FROM QRCodeTransactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT qr_code, amount FROM QRCodeTransactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT user_name, qr_code FROM QRCodeUsers ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT location_name FROM QRCodeLocations WHERE location_name LIKE '%mall%';
SELECT * FROM QRCodePayments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM QRCodeTransactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, qr_code FROM QRCodeUsers WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT location_name, qr_code FROM QRCodeLocations WHERE qr_code = 'abcd1234';
SELECT action, description, timestamp FROM QRCodeLogs WHERE action = 'payment_failure' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, qr_code, amount FROM QRCodeTransactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
